attributes.action: Introduce a consultation and referendum on a flag for Northern Ireland
attributes.background: The Government should begin the process of a consultation so that all four countries of the United Kingdom has a flag - in which Northern Ireland does not at the moment. This should then be put to a referendum for a popular choice for the flag.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the designation of specific flags.
